original_title: ついに彼女と初体験できる！！って思ったら…隣のお姉さんに童貞を横取りされて…12発くらい発射させられ…精子無くなっちゃった…。 青空ひかり パンティと写真付き
overview: Brush thief! ? First experience NTR! Slut Neighbor Birth! Just before her first experience with her first girlfriend, she was deprived of her virginity by her older sister who lives next to her, and her sperm was squeezed out over and over again. Huh...? ? My first experience... not with her... next door sister! ? ? "Are you going to have her first sex with her? Is it tomorrow? W" There may not be any sperm left for her! !
title: I can finally have my first time with her! But then… the sister next door takes over my virginity… Hikari Aozora
